unnormalised: The key takeaway? To go viral, you need to tap into the Indian pulse. Understand our values, our humour, and our love for all things authentic. And remember, sometimes all it takes is a well-timed meme or a heartfelt story to capture the nation's attention. Keep experimenting, keep creating, and who knows, maybe your content will be the next big thing trending across India on 15/08/2024! Good luck!
